${ModID}:BloodWall.NAME: BloodWall
${ModID}:BloodWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP.

${ModID}:GoldenPick.NAME: Golden Pick
${ModID}:GoldenPick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Gain !M! *Gold plus !${ModID}:m2! *Gold for each card in your deck.

${ModID}:DeckCheck.NAME: Deck Check
${ModID}:DeckCheck.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the larger of your draw or discard pile sizes.

${ModID}:BigBoots.NAME: Big Boots
${ModID}:BigBoots.DESCRIPTION: If your draw or discard pile has !${ModID}:m2!+ cards, draw !M! cards. NL Draw 1 card. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Add a *Stack to your deck.
